Reviews.Title: “Clean Boutique hotel away from the hustle and bustle”
Reviews.Author: Alybaba786
Reviews.Content: A bit expensive for what you get, but clean and comfortable. Away from shopping, public transport, and main sightseeing, so plan on taking taxis.

Reviews.Title: “fabulous views, great restaurant and very helpful staff away from the hustle and bustle”
Reviews.Author: jess1960
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 3 nights at La Maison in September 2011. The room was a bit on the small and basic side but it was functional, clean, quiet and the beds were very comfortable. What really made the hotel was (a) the very helpful staff (b) the excellent and very reasonable restaurant with the most fantastic views of the Bosphorus and (c) the view from our small but perfectly formed balcony. Would definitely stay there again. A ferry port at Besiktas is a fairly short (but steep) walk away, about 20 mins, and the fantastic area of Ortakoy where there are numerous restaurants etc, is also within walking distance - maybe 35-40 mins. Taxis are OK price-wise but the traffic most of the day is unbelievably heavy so journeys can be extremely slow. Great shower and good wee hairdryer. Mini bar prices are reasonable. The local area is very residential and there is a mosque at the end of the road so you get to wake up at about 5am to the sound of the call to prayer. We loved it. A couple of things would make this even better - tea/coffee making facilities in the room would have been nice, and a couple of small chairs on the balcony would be the icing on the cake.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel in residential area”
Reviews.Author: RobertRx
Reviews.Content: We were here with a group of people who came to Istanbul for a congress and business meeting. All of us liked the hotel. Human scale, friendly staff, restaurant view a great view, and excellent food. The location on a rather steep hill keeps visitors fit. What could be improved: baby crib and chair. All in all, a very positive experience.

Reviews.Title: “Gem of a small boutique hotel. View is worth it.”
Reviews.Author: Mang0addict
Reviews.Content: I stayed at LA MAISOn with my family and a group of friends and we basically rented the hotel for 10 days. The service was wonderful. The staff was great and very personable. I went to Istanbul with a little concern about this hotel, since I have never stayed at a small hotel, but this was worth every penny. The front lobby staff was courteous and friendly. They did exactly what we told them to do. They helped us with any language barriers and communicated efficiently. The hotel is located on avery steep hill and can cause a little pain but the taxis were able to access the hotel without any problems. The view from the terrace is AMAZING. Great photos and worth a visit. Breakfast was decent but the same for daily routine. ighly recommend this small and cozy place. The beds were also very comfortable. A big shout out to all the staff including the following members - Nur, Ipek, Irem, Haydar, Nuh and others. Nur speaks english and is very friendly and courteous. But generally, all were amazing staff.
